official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to suspend retroactively operations and production on oil and gas leases ES 2538 and ES 2539.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to suspend specified oil and gas leases.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to suspend retroactively operations and production on oil and gas leases ES 2538 and ES 2539.
